item.title: By: Kieran
item.dc:creator: Kieran
item.description: <p>Hi Matt - saw your brother at the weekend - Sally and I had a lovely relaxing time in Lowdham - the Whites certainly know how to 'chill out'. Anyway, he mentioned your website so I thought I'd have a look - great stuff. Hope you are well and prospering - I'm still at Sport England but recently promoted to Senior Development Manager - enjoying myself. There are a lot of redundancies etc. happening here, but I'm safe in my job I think! Hopefully see you soon. Kieran</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matt – saw your brother at the weekend – Sally and I had a lovely relaxing time in Lowdham – the Whites certainly know how to ‘chill out’. Anyway, he mentioned your website so I thought I’d have a look – great stuff. Hope you are well and prospering – I’m still at Sport England but recently promoted to Senior Development Manager – enjoying myself. There are a lot of redundancies etc. happening here, but I’m safe in my job I think! Hopefully see you soon. Kieran
